content.text:
# Draft:Operation Hataw King

----
Operation Hataw King is the codename of an imminent "large-scale and robust military operation" in Rakhine State, Myanmar, announced by Myanmar's Office of the Commander-in-Chief of Defence.
In an official statement, the Commander-in-Chief's Office said the operation was approved by the National Defence and Security Council to "maintain the sovereignty and territorial integrity of the country."
The statement included an "Emergency Alert for Public Safety," warning that "coordinated airstrikes" targeting strongholds of the "Arakan Army ethnic armed group" will "begin shortly."
More info coming.......
